text: Nicole Brown Simpson (May 19, 1959 â€“ June 12, 1994) was a German-American model. She was the ex-wife of retired professional football player and actor O. J. Simpson. They were married from 1985 to 1992. She was the mother of their two children, Sydney and Justin. She was murdered at her home in Los Angeles, California, on June 12, 1994, along with her friend, restaurant waiter Ron Goldman, two years after her divorce from Simpson. This led to the controversial criminal trial of Simpson. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Murders by blade weapons Category:American crime victims Category:American models Category:People from Frankfurt
title: Nicole Brown Simpson
